name: Icicle Crash
description: You generate a row of icicles that crash down on top of a creature in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE ice damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or higher, the target flinches.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

effect.name: Excites the audience a lot if used last.
effect.effect: Raises the crowd meter by 2 if successfully performed last in correct contest, raises the crowd meter by 1 if successfully performed last in complementary contest.
